0011101111101000 0100101110000001 0 -> sum: 1000011101101001, cout: 0
1100101011011111 0100110110110011 0 -> sum: 0001100010010010, cout: 1

0111000100101011 1000101000110111 0 -> sum: 1111101101100010, cout: 0
1101100001011101 0001000111101000 1 -> sum: 1110101001000110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
